description: Easy plug-and-play USB, high-definition 1080P web camera and built-in microphone Features high resolution COMS color sensors that supports large capture size and records up to 1080p at speeds of 30 frames per second Automatically adjusts color compensation and brightness Clear, stereo quality sound Compatible with multiple software and systems: Windows XP/ 2000/ 2003/ Vista/ 7/ 8/ 10, Mac OS, Android and Linux Adjustable clip enables it to be mounted on any type of monitor screen, stand alone on a desk or screwed onto a tripod Includes built-in 48” USB 2.0 cable and manual

name: 5W Assure Speaker with Wireless Charger
description: 5 watt wireless speaker with 10 watt wireless charging surface LED indicator lights – Blue for power on & pairing; Red for speaker charging; Green for wireless device charging TWS capable when two units are paired White plastic housing with non-slip silicone accents on the top and bottom of the unit Approx up to 8 hours of playtime Approx 2 – 3 hours charging time Operating range: up to 33ft/10m Auto shut off after 5 standby minutes (if not connected) Wireless charge Output: up to 10W Speaker Input: DC 5V/1A, 5V/2A, 5V/3A Connect via Bluetooth® V5.3 Charges through most protective cases Not compatible with cases featuring magnetic components, metal or finger ring Includes Type-C USB charging cable and manual Wall charger not included (5V QC2.0 and QC3.0 power adapters recommended) NOTE: If your device is not compatible with wireless charging you may require external wireless charging receiver or receiver case

name: Desktop Speaker System
description: Includes 4 AAA batteries The special designed docking design includes retractable stereo input plug (compatible with iPods), attached auxiliary input cable for other iPods/MP3 and other audio players. This desktop speaker transforms your iPod, MP3, CD players and other audio players into a mini stereo.

name: Water Resistant Phone Case/Speaker
description: Easy snap of the top closure your device will be secure all day. Features a protective body, soft front window panel to control your touch screen devices. Works with most touch screen devices that have a 3.5mm jack. LED on/off switch for the case and a stand on the back. Includes 3AAA batteries
marketingPoints: Duracell AAA Battery upgrade available at time of order.

name: Swivel Phone Holder/ Speaker
description: Made with ABS plastic and silicone. The silicone front panel keeps all your hand held devices securely mounted without leaving any sticky residue behind. Features a 180 degree rotation to provide the best viewing angles. Mobile phone speaker with amplifier, USB power cable and 3.5mm audio cable. Can be powered by a USB cord or by 3 AAA batteries.

name: Bluetooth® Receiver w/Mic
description: Wireless Bluetooth® receiver connects simply to your earphones or speakers and pairs easily with your phone via Bluetooth® V2.1 with EDR for superior wireless performance Can transmit up to 10M/33 feet away Features two audio jacks to plug in 2 earphone cords and microphone Includes USB charging cable and earphones

name: Boompods™ Headpods
description: Stylish headphones boasting excellent sound quality and functionality Adjustable headband and cushioned ear cups for soft, comfortable wearing Features a fold-flat design for easy storage and transport Your choice of one of 5 different color headphones. Includes an easy-to-attach 3.5mm audio jack

name: Cordz Braided Earbuds
description: Features sporty, tangle-resistant cord Compatible with virtually all phones and portable devices with a 3.5mm headphone audio jack Noise isolation earbuds create a seal blocking most outside noise to maximize sound quality Includes cable clip, as well as small, medium and large ear cushions All contained in a compact round carrying/storage case
marketingPoints: Digital Laminate Panel (4 color process) on One Location.
Includes One Standard Color only on One Location.

name: UL Listed USB Dual AC Adapter
description: UL Listed Features dual 1A (low) and 2.1A (high) USB ports LED border lights up blue to showcase logo when unit is plugged in Compact and portable; foldable plug tucks into charger for storage and travel Includes user manual

name: Opus Headphones
description: Equally well suited for home, office or travel Flexible headband with soft, padded ear cups Includes single braided cable to reduce tangles Perfect for use with all 3.5mm audio devices

name: Boompods™ Sportpod Headphone
description: Flexible and lightweight headband will wrap easily around your head for maximum comfort Sweat-proof with an IPX6 rating Angled earbuds will ensure a secure fit in your ears Pair and play music in seconds, and control your phone or media player from a listening range of 10m/33ft for up to 6 hours straight with a 2.5 hour recharge time Features: Bluetooth® pair, next song, previous song, volume up, volume down and a play/pause/answer/hang-up button Includes Micro/USB cable for recharging and instruction manual

name: Boompods™ Skypod Headphones
description: Wireless Bluetooth® V4.0 CSR headphones Microphone ensures that conversations are crystal clear Switch between calls and music without disconnecting any of your portable devices Stream audio from your laptop, or any other Bluetooth® enabled device up to 10M/33 feet away Battery offers up to 10 hours of talk/play time when fully charged; 3-hour recharge time Includes USB charging cable, Neoprene pouch for storage and 3.5mm audio cable for a direct connection

name: Zen Bluetooth® Earbuds
description: Flexible headband with tangle-free design Bluetooth® V4.0 Earbuds can pair with 2 Bluetooth® enabled devices at once Listening range of 10m/33ft for up to 4 straight hours of playtime with a 1½ hour recharge time Built-in microphone/controller allows you to answer/end calls, play, stop, forward or even to go back to a previous song Includes: 3 different sized ear cushions, micro USB cable for recharging, cable clip, instruction manual

name: Boompods™ Double Blaster Bluetooth® Speaker
description: Compact Bluetooth® mini speaker is a great way to listen to your music from your phone or audio devices. Speaker is easy to connect using Bluetooth® V2.1 EDR and it also supports wired media devices with a 3.5mm plug. Features a built in rechargeable lithium-ion battery and an operating range of 10M/33 feet and a rubberized base to provide stability. Includes an all-in-one USB charging/3.5mm and audio cable. 3 Watt Bluetooth® speaker

name: RoxBox™ Duet Bluetooth® Speaker
description: Speaker is easy to connect using A2DP V3.0 EDR and has an operating range of 10M/33 feet Turn any mobile device into a portable sound system Built-in subwoofer provides exceptional quality sound Built-in mic allows for use as a hands-free phone and is perfect for conference calls Features three easy-to-use buttons on the top of the speaker - phone button to take calls, volume up, and volume down Includes a USB cable for recharging and a 3.5mm audio jack for non-Bluetooth® devices
marketingPoints: Can fully charge in approx. 3hrs. Provides 4-5 hrs of playing time depending on volume used.

name: RoxBox™ Cyclone Bluetooth® Speaker
description: Portable and compact, yet produces exceptional sound quality that can fit into any space, indoor or outdoor. IPX5 water resistant rating. Powered by V2.1 EDR Bluetooth® technology. Listen up to a range of 10m/33ft for up to 5 hours straight with a 3 hour recharge time. Features a light power indicator, a built-in microphone with button for hands-free calling, on/off button, and volume control buttons. Includes a USB charging cable and port, an auxiliary cable and a manual.

name: Persona® Bluetooth® Speaker
description: 3 Watt speaker Easy to connect using Bluetooth® V2.1 EDR and supports wired media devices with a 3.5 mm plug Features a built-in FM radio and 4 easy to use buttons on the base of the speaker Volume can also be controlled with a twist of the base of the speaker Mini/USB cable acts as the antennae for radio Includes micro/USB cable, audio cable and built-in micro SD card slot Operating range of 10M/33 feet Available in 13 colors

name: RoxBox™ Clip Bluetooth® Speaker
description: 1.5 Watt Speaker Remote shutter on the back of the case Easy to connect using Bluetooth® V2.1 EDR and supports wired media devices with a 3.5 mm plug Features 4 hours of play time, 2 hour recharge time and has an operating range of 10M/33 feet 4 easy to use buttons on the back of the speaker Includes built-in carabineer clip

name: RoxBox™ Retro Bluetooth® Speaker
description: IPX5 water resistant rating V2.1 EDR Bluetooth®, built-in mic; supports NFC technology 12 watt speaker 4 easy to use buttons: Power/Mode button, volume-/previous song, play/pause/hands-free, volume /next button. Includes Micro/USB cable for recharging, 3.5mm audio cable for non-Bluetooth® devices, and manual Top handle for easy transport; rubberized feet for stability Listen range of 10m/33ft for up to 5 hours straight with a 3 hour recharge time.

name: Boompods™ Sportpods Race
description: IPX6 sweat-resistant rating Bluetooth® 4.0 CSR Easy touch controls on clip-on pod with tactile recognition Ergonomic in-ear design Moldable ear hooks and cable pull toggle Includes one set of memory foam ear tips and 3 different sized rubber earbuds Also comes with Micro/USB cable for recharging, drawstring pouch for storage and instruction manual Listening range of 10m/33ft for up to 4 hours straight, with a 1½ hour recharge time

name: 133 Piece All Purpose First Aid Kit
description: Quick access and well organized in a soft case Includes thirty 3" bandages, thirty-five 1 1/2" bandages, five wide 3" bandages, two butterfly stitch bandages Two knuckle bandages, five 1 1/2" Sq. bandages, two fingertip bandages, two elbow/knee bandages, one non-adherent gauze pad, one dressing bandage, one eye pad Ten alcohol prep wipes, ten cleansing wipes, one roll of first aid tape, mylar blanket, one triangular bandage, one cold compress Scissors, tweezers, one roll gauze tape, latex free exam gloves, four gauze pads, one finger splint, two safety pins and ten cotton swabs

name: 34 Piece First Aid Kit
description: Conveniently packed in a zippered EVA case Includes bandage roll, six alcohol pads, triangular bandage, two gauze pads, ten adhesive bandages, scissors, first aid tape, four safety pins, pair of Vinyl gloves, four cleansing wipes, non-woven mask and bandage roll

name: Compact 85 Piece 1st Aid Kit
description: Perfect for your automobile, camping, or home The 85 piece kit is all contained in a water resistant EVA case with carbineer Featuring a First Aid contents card, scissors, metal tweezers, one pair of vinyl gloves (L), mini rescue whistle Ten antiseptic wipes, fourteen alcohol pads, triangle bandage with two pins, 5" x 9" dressing pad Fifteen  3/8" x 1 1/2" bandages, ten adhesive bandages 3” x 1”, ten butterfly bandages, four knuckle bandages Two non-adherent sterile pads 2" x 3", 4"x 4" sterile gauze pad (2 /pk), 3" x 3" sterile gauze pad (2/pk) Four 2" x 2" sterile Gauze, elastic bandage 2” x 14” and two adhesive tapes 0.5” x 16

name: 41 Piece Metal First Aid Kit
description: Contains 4 alcohol pads, 4 BZK wipes, 10 – 1” x 3” adhesive bandages, 10 – 3/8” x 1 ½” adhesive bandages, 10 – ¾” x 3” adhesive bandages, 1 finger adhesive bandage and 1 knuckle adhesive bandage First aid essentials conveniently contained in a matte black metal case

Designed to insulate nearly all 12oz and 16oz cans and bottles (over 500+ drinks) Double-wall vacuum-insulated Stainless Steel Keeps contents cold for 12+ hours Silicone lid locks cans & bottles in place Non-slip Silicone bottom Powder-coated styles (laser engraved only), Silicone rings, and straws are dishwasher safe.
